verses.name: Luke 23:42
verses.text: And he said unto Jesus, Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom.

verses.name: Luke 23:43
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.

verses.name: Luke 23:44
verses.text: And it was about the sixth hour, and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour.

verses.name: Luke 23:45
verses.text: And the sun was darkened, and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst.

verses.name: Luke 23:46
verses.text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice, he said, Father, into thy hands I commend my spirit: and having said thus, he gave up the ghost.
